thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 11 of 2268
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: First time we have used blinds 2 go and a bit aprehensive about buying this over the Internet, but measurements were simple and the blinds then fitted perfectly. Our local suppliers were scepticle that they could do the quality at such a good price but we are very happy with all aspects of the blinds. They fit well, the blinds were exactly as per samples and they look great. We also liked the ability to look at many different samaples before buying at no cost and very fast response.
